Quest.name: Quest 1: Find some grog for the drunken old pirate
Quest.description: Poor ol' Le Chuck is down on his luck and suffering from a dreadful hangover. Before he'll talk to you any more you'll need to find him some Grog!

Objective.name: 1) Visit the docks and find the Scumm Bar
2) Search the Bar for a bottle of Grog
3) Bring the Grog back to Le Chuck
